items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system that suggests relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
Recommendations are generated within 2 seconds of page load.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
non_functional: Scalable to handle 1 million daily active users

notes: User requirement was vague; assumed the need for personalized recommendations using AI, integrated into the e-commerce platform's user interface.
